title: ‘Little Sister’ haunts novelist in Southern Gothic tale
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Books - Today 
If you mix Stephen King with William Faulkner, the result would be the posthumous novel “Little Sister Death” by William Gay. The story ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
